Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: I come in simp[C]licity longing for [F]purity to worship [Am]You in Spirit and [G]truth, only [F]You. Lord, strip it [C]all away till only [F]You remain. I'm coming [Am]back to my first [G]love, only [C]You.
CHORUS: You're the [F]reason I [G]sing, the [C/E]reason I [Am7]sing. Yes, [F]my heart will [G]sing how I l[C]ove You. [Csus2 C] And for[F]ever I'll [G]sing, for[C/E]ever I'll [Am7]sing. Yes, [F]my heart will [G]sing how I l[C]ove You.
{new_page} VERSE 2: I come with my [C]broken song to You, the [F]perfect One, to worship [Am]You in Spirit and [G]truth, only [F]You. Give me a [C]child-like heart, lead me to [F]where You are. I'm coming [Am]back to my first [G]love, only [C]You.
BRIDGE: How I [F]love You, how I [C]love You, How I [F]love You, my first [C]love. How I [F]love You, how I [C]love You, How I [F]love You, my first [C]love.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i come in simplicity longing for purity to worship you in spirit and truth only you lord strip it all away till only you remain im coming back to my first love only you chorus youre the reason i sing the reason i sing yes my heart will sing how i love you and forever ill sing forever ill sing yes my heart will sing how i love you verse 2 i come with my broken song to you the perfect one to worship you in spirit and truth only you give me a childlike heart lead me to where you are im coming back to my first love only you bridge how i love you how i love you how i love you my first love how i love you how i love you how i love you my first love
